## VertexSemantic type

The semantic type of vertex

**Signature:**

```typescript
type VertexSemantic = 'position' | 'normal' | 'diffuse' | 'tangent' | 'blendIndices' | 'blendWeights' | 'texCoord0' | 'texCoord1' | 'texCoord2' | 'texCoord3' | 'texCoord4' | 'texCoord5' | 'texCoord6' | 'texCoord7';
```
